diff_hunk:

         handle = cudnn.get_handle()
         fn.datatype = cudnn._typemap[input.type()]
         is_input_packed = fn.batch_sizes is not None
-

+            warnings.warn(
+                "Warning: persistent algorithm not supported for variable length input."

body: It's more like standard algo has unpredictable perf because with each new release cublas heuristics can change, and standard algo uses cublas.
